MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH3 postcode area of Guilden Sutton, Chester, affecting properties in Arrowcroft Road and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2.58AM.  Due to a potentially dangerous situation on site, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:41AM on 25th January 2021
